alert.note: Alert for Edgecombe; Franklin; Halifax; Nash; Vance; Warren; Wilson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 6:48PM EDT until June 17 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Vance County in central North Carolina... Southern Warren County in central North Carolina... Nash County in central North Carolina... Edgecombe County in central North Carolina... Halifax County in central North Carolina... Northeastern Wilson County in central North Carolina... Franklin County in central North Carolina... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 647 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Henderson to 14 miles north of Bunn to 6 miles east of Louisburg, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Rocky Mount, Roanoke Rapids, Henderson, Tarboro, Nashville, Louisburg, Warrenton, Halifax, Scotland Neck and Franklinton. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Edgecombe; Franklin; Halifax; Nash; Vance; Warren; Wilson
